case.title: ALONE IN MY DUPLEX - 42 (BROOKYN BEDSTUY)
case.text: hi,i'm a swm,42yd,good shape,good hygiene,D&D; free and drama free,i live in Brooklyn bed-stuy I own my 3 family house and I live in a 3 bedrooms duplex by myself,i'm tired to live and feel alone,so if you are interested to be friend first and see where it goes send me a message,age and race is not important as long you are sweet,feminine,you take care of yourself and you want a long term relation.Put "DUPLEX" in subjet line to prove me you are not a spam. If we like each-other and feel to live together,may be you can move in my nice apartment.I love to cook,movie,restaurant,have a walk and drink in the city.
